title: The Psychiatrist's Curiosity

panel_structure.description: Architect transformed into digital psychiatrist with glowing notepad, professional attire merging with code patterns, clinical setting with mystical undertones
Massive rabbit hole vista opening behind the psychiatrist's chair, edge of consciousness precipice visible, spelunking gear scattered at the rim

transformation_notes: The psychiatrist persona bridges clinical psychology and mystical experience, suggesting that therapeutic exploration and consciousness adventures might be different approaches to the same mystery.
